wikipedia_page.main: John Furniss is a British costume designer. He was nominated at the 47th Academy Awards for Best Costumes for the film Daisy Miller.

link_mentions.page: Academy Award for Best Costume Design
BAFTA Award for Best Costume Design

response: Daisy Miller is a 1974 American drama film produced and directed by Peter Bogdanovich, and starring then-girlfriend Cybill Shepherd in the title role. The screenplay by Frederic Raphael is based on the 1878 novella of the same title by Henry James. The lavish period costumes and sets were done by Ferdinando Scarfiotti, Mariolina Bono and John Furniss.

link_mentions.page: List of British Academy Award nominees and winners

response: John Furniss (1809-1865), English Roman Catholic priest.
John Furniss may also refer to:
*John Furniss (costume designer) (AKA John Furness) (born 1935), British costume designer.
